title: Tuxgear Pre Tied Bow Tie with Adjustable Neck Strap (Boys and Mens Size Options)
features: FABRIC TYPE: 100% Premium Deluxe Polyester Satin

STYLISH COLORED SATIN ACCESSORY: This quality bow tie is the perfect trendy accessory for your next exciting event like a wedding, an anniversary or a great choice to add to your dance performance attire! Absolutely adorable for Christmas, Easter, photos and pageant wear. This neckwear will add the finishing touches to your wardrobe for every day wear.

TRENDY ADJUSTABLE BOW TIE: This beautiful bow tie is crafted with a wraparound adjustable strap that hooks under the bow knot. This adjustable neckwear is perfect for all ages; available in men’s and boys’ sizes and available in several pastel and bold colors.

PERFECT FIT: Men’s Size Fits 14 and up Measuring about 2 1/4" high and 4 1/2" wide with wrap around adjustable neck strap fitting 13.5" to a 22.5 ". Boy’s Size Fits Ages 2 to 12 Measuring about 1 3/4" high and 3 1/2" wide with wrap around adjustable neck strap fitting 10.5" to a 14.5 ".
EXCELLENT QUALITY: This high-quality beautiful bow tie is crafted with top grade fabrics and is designed for comfort and durability.
GUARANTEED SATISFACTION: We offer a hassle free 30 day guarantee. We want you to be happy and satisfied with your purchase and to be a part of our family for life!
description: Quality pre-tied bow tie in both kids and adults sizes. These ties are made from a quality Polyester Satin material blend for a quality appearance. Each tie features a wrap around adjustable neck strap that hooks in the back so you can easily fit many different neck sizes. We recommend the kids tie for ages 3-8 and the adult tie for ages 10-UP (These sizes are recommendations however it is up the customer to decide what they prefer for in between ages)
